content: Perch√© l'intero universo io chiamo Nulla, salvo te, mia rosa; in esso tu sei il mio Tutto.
translations: eng:For I call the whole universe nothing, Except you, my rose; in it you are my everything
eng:For nothing this wide universe I call, Save thou, my rose; in it thou art my all
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by xicotenga (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
